Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Westbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, LaSalle, Adams, Wacker and Madison due to street blockage near Madison/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, LaSalle, Adams, Wacker and Madison due to street blockage near Madison/LaSalle.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
